outcomeMeasures.title: HbA1c (%)
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c measured at baseline and after 52 weeks of treatment with Liraglutide or placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Weekly Glucose Concentrations.
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean weekly glucose concentrations measured by CGM at baseline and at 52 weeks

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Weight
outcomeMeasures.description: Body weight in Kg measured at weeks 0 (baseline) and at 52 weeks after treatment with liraglutide or placebo
